scripts.reset: npx knex migrate:rollback --all && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.spinup2: docker exec -it itec_exchange psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE itec_exchange;"
scripts.spinup3: npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.spinup: npm run spinup1 && npm run spinup2 && npm run spinup3
scripts.docker-reset: docker exec -it itec_exchange psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE itec_exchange;"
